This is more information about the projects I have worked on.

Household data management system

With the library management system, it was a project we did in my second year to demostrate that we have acquired the necessary skills about software development.
This software collects and stores data about the number of people in a Household. It stores their skills and qualifications, etc.
Its main purpose is to assist community members with beneficial information about opportunities available for families to make their lives better. For example, opportunities like jobs, learnerships, etc.

library management system

This software basically recorded the credentials of the person who borrowed a book from our local libary.
It recorded how many books were borrowed, and how long the person is supposed to use the book before they can return it to the library
The software was coded and developed using C# programming language.

Text messages app

On the text messages app, we designed this app similar to WhatsApp which sent text messages, videos, music, files, etc.
This app was to test whether we have obtained and mastered the relevant technologies needed for cloud computing with databases. This software has to function in real as how a normal text messages app should function.
